content: As an AI language model, I can provide general information about the Atlantic City Police Department. According to recent reports, the Atlantic City Police Department has about 267 officers. The number of officers on patrol at any given time can vary depending on the time of day, day of the week, and other factors that affect the demand for police services. The police department uses a number of strategies to allocate resources and ensure that there are enough officers on patrol to handle calls for service and maintain public safety.
